original_text: And, lo, it was all grown over with thorns, and nettles had covered the face thereof, and the stone wall thereof was broken down.
korean_text: 가시덤불이 그 전부에 퍼졌으며 그 지면이 거친 풀로 덮였고 돌담이 무너져 있기로

sentences.original_text: And, lo, it was all grown over with thorns
and nettles had covered the face thereof
and the stone wall thereof was broken down
